item.title: The Reaper Visits the Washington Post
item.description: We should not overlook former editor Marty Baron’s role in the newspaper’s predicament.

item.title: Iran Wants to Turn Back Time
item.description: But why would the United States indulge this fantasy?

item.title: Resist the Temptation of Woodrow Wilson
item.description: Don’t admire Woodrow Wilson. Not even once.

item.title: Medical Malpractice Comes Home to Roost in Detransitioner Verdict
item.description: Young people who were victimized by ideology masquerading as medicine are beginning to get justice in our courts.

item.title: The University of Notre Dame’s Alarming Pro-Abortion Appointment
item.description: Susan Ostermann’s elevation would mark the first time the school has had a leader known for publicly and habitually repudiating a core component of it...
